projects.name: Frontend - Admin Dashboard for Schedule Management
projects.description: An interactive platform for managing schedules of the university's subjects, allowing administrators to create, update, and delete classes and manage student enrollments.

projects.name: Frontend - Schedule Visualizer
projects.description: A web application that allows students to visualize their class schedules, providing an intuitive interface to view their academic timetable.

projects.name: Python Scrapper for extracting the schedules
projects.description: A Python script designed to scrape class schedules from the university's website and a SharePoint, automating the process of data extraction for further processing.
